snippet.title: Super Freaks Classic Pack
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD [WINDOWS ONLY]: https://superfreaksdev.itch.io/super-freaks-classic-pack

I realized it didn't make much sense to have TWO separate classic Super Freaks packs so I merged them into one. As of today the pack features:

--Scruffy 1: The Search for Tikiman (2006)
--Super Freaks 1 Remastered (2016)
--Scruffy 2: Scruffy's Quest (2007)
--Scruffy Rides Again (2007)
--Scruffy 3: A Day in the Life (2008)
--Strato-Scruffy (2009, Completed 2023)
--The New Quincy's Adventure (2014, Original by Kingnormal in 2006)
--Super Freaks: The Demo (SAGE 2016)

The more classic games I polish up (or in some cases finish), I'll add them to the pack as well.
I am also excited to announce this pack will be at SAGE 2023! ...in a slightly altered form, because Strato-Scruffy is good enough to have its own booth there, so it will have a separate download there. Between Ultimate, Strato, and the 7 other classic games, there will be a staggering 9 Super Freaks games at SAGE this year.
